title: Why do I feel mental stress when I transcribe songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because you are taking a multidimentional aural input, filtering that input through a mechanism of your own device, where it probably gets truncated in one way or another. Then you build a physical construct from that process with a pencil and paper? Or onto a hard drive? It’s a tremendously counter intuitive thing to do. a lot of pressure on yourself. Have fun with it. Let it be less than perfect. Let it be what it is.
